entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of showers this afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High 10. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries or rain showers late this evening and after midnight. Clearing overnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 5. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MDT Monday 17 April 2023
